name: COOKIE STEALING
description:
In the game you steal Cookies from a conveyor belt by pressing the correct buttons.

In the first menu you can chance three parameters:

  • Number: the Number of patterns before the cycle start over
  • Speed: The Speed of the conveyor belt
  • Distance: the distance between two patterns

After selecting play you can chose between three game modes:

  1. Normal: You try to get a high score with the set settings
  2. Speed:  The game starts on a low speed and gets faster after timer
  3.  Swap: The Buttons are randomly swapt but repeat in the next cycle

credits:

  • Sounds: dustyroom.com

This Game was created for the The Three Button Jam. This was my first completed Jam, and definitely not my last. Have fun!
